name: ViennaMath
short_description: ViennaMath provides a symbolic math kernel which can be used either for compile-time processing, or for run-time evaluation. Unlike other symbolic math implementations, ViennaMath aims at providing a fast math layer for use with numerical methods such as the finite element method (cf. ViennaFEM)
summary: A symbolic math kernel in C++
